author: kevinbogner
content: Can you give a quick update regarding the applications? Are you still reviewing them or already interviewing the participants?

author: phas0ruk
content: A quick update on the application process would be great agreed.

author: ameya
content: What's a good first step to start contributing? Would love some resources to get started

author: kevinbogner
content: https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/projects/project-ideas.md There are proposed projects by mentors + projects previous cohorts worked on. So you know what you can expect

author: kevinbogner
content: https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/program-guide/reading.md also, if you want to read some general stuff about Ethereum
